2814.name: BANNED_DEVICE_IN_NEX_SERVICE
2814.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2814.short_description: Your console is permanently banned from this game.
2814.long_description: Your console has been permanently banned from this game for breaking the rules.
2814.short_solution: Appeal the ban on the forum.
